SELECT COUNT(LECTURE_NUMBER) FROM TBL_LECTURE WHERE LECTURE_STATUS = '진행완료'
SELECT COUNT(LECTURE_NUMBER) FROM TBL_LECTURE WHERE LECTURE_STATUS = '진행중'
